divs: Sighting DetailsThis is not an event I witnessed. I just let you know that in the local news are presenting the stoy of a luminous sphere-shape object hiting the ground in the state of Hidalgo. Aparentley there are hundreds of witnesses, some say it was fireball, others say it was an airplane crashing, and some others say it was a meteor. The local authority has no official report on what was that. The local farmers claim that the army is gurading the impact site. I don't know if has something to do with UFOs but its a curious event.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tulancingo
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Luminous object impacts on the ground
